title: Totem
overview: Adventure reality show with two groups of Hungarian celebrities (Wolves and Stags). The teams fighting against each other in several types of tasks (treasure hunt, obstacle course, duel, etc.) to acquire 7 different crystals. The tasks connected to Hungarian mythology and fantasy stories. After any phase (such as air phase, fire phase, bravery phase) one of the team who lost the race have to send to mates to a duel, and one of them will leave the show.
